text.div:
Diphtheria (Tests for Corynebacterium diphtheriae by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    14479-0 Diphtheria identified in Throat by Organism specific culture
    14480-8 Diphtheria identified in Sputum by Organism specific culture
    14481-6 Diphtheria identified in Nose by Organism specific culture
    14482-4 Diphtheria identified in Skin by Organism specific culture
    14483-2 Diphtheria identified in Bronchial specimen by Organism specific culture
    16676-9 Corynebacterium diphtheriae [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    567-8 Diphtheria identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    6596-1 Diphtheria identified in Isolate by Organism specific culture
    88584-8 Corynebacterium diphtheriae [Presence] in Upper respiratory specimen by Organism specific culture
